title: Seriously, What Is Going On In Brooklyn?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk Steve Nash & the Nets parting ways, Brooklyn pursuing Ime Udoka, the issues surrounding Kyrie Irving’s tweet and discuss a general lack of accountability- . 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: How The Kyrie Situation Has Been Handled Poorly & Organizational Concerns
